basic.blooming: Flowering period July-October, fruiting period August-November
basic.color: Flower color light purple , fruit color purple brown

maintenance.soil: Slightly acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
